Entry.JapaneseText: ポプラさんって、 とても元気な方なのですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Ms. Poplar is quite a cheerful individual.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、でも今は、一生懸命、明るくふるまっている。 自分を励ますため……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... But at the moment, she's trying her best to be cheerful so that she can keep her own spirits up.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、みんなが仲のよかった あの頃に戻るために……
Entry.EnglishText: She's doing it for everyone else's sake, too. She wants everyone to get along with each other again.
